I grabbed these brushes to clean my tile grout. These brushes make the job so much easier. Each brush is uniquely designed, allowing you to clean every nook and cranny with precision.  The narrow, angled brush is perfect for getting into tight spaces and corners, while the stiff-bristled brush easily scrubs away dirt and grime from the grout lines without damaging the tiles.  I’ve used these brushes on both bathroom tiles and my tile floors, and they’ve delivered outstanding results every time. The bristles are durable, yet gentle enough not to scratch the surfaces. Plus, the ergonomic handles provide a comfortable grip, making even long cleaning sessions less tiring.  These brushes have made grout cleaning a breeze. They save time, require less effort, and leave my grout looking like new. If you’re looking for a reliable and effective set of tools for grout cleaning, I highly recommend these brushes. They’re worth every penny!

This brushes are stiff, clean fairly well, and don't feel like they will start to immediately fall apart. They are a pretty good value for the price.

The 3 brushes have extremely sturdy bristles, and a narrow profile to get into small crevices. That narrow profile is just right to get into the narrow crevices of grout, so the effort is concentrated where it is needed.  One of the brushes was used to clean the bathtub grout, the groove in the slider window, the bathroom floor tile grout, and around the bottom of the toilet. The brush handle was very comfortable, and the bristles help up very well, showing no sign of wear whatsoever.  It appears these will last for while, and they do a great job with those hard bristles. I've attempted to clean the grout with 2 other grout brushes, but those were just a bit wider than the grout line. These narrow brushes seemed to do a better job with less effort.

These little brushes are great for cleaning in tight crevices.  Also works for cleaning grout.  I keep finding uses for them.  They  have very stiff plastic bristles that don't leave marks like metal brushes.These were exactly what I was looking for.

Often stains remain in the corners of the toilets even after using of toilet cleaner and rubbing through typical toilet brush which are often has rounded surface. What was needed is sharp and curved edges that can reach all hidden corners at the top and down the bottom hole. This set of three brushes is perfect for my three bathrooms as it reaches all previously unreachable sides. Its hard bristle helps too. I am happy to use it.

These cleaning brushes are amazing for getting into thin, tight spaces! I used them to clean the tracks and crevices on my sliding glass doors and windows, and they helped tremendously! I had initially forgotten I had them when I first started cleaning and was frustrated that there were areas I couldn't reach. So thankful I remembered them bc they solved my problem and pretty quickly and easily too! The bristles will get misshapen if you are using them for big jobs, but they are totally worth it!! I would definitely repurchase.
Nice stiff bristles for cleaning crevices around kitchen.  Or grout on countertops and floors.  Curved for good access into small spaces or around sinks.  3 brushes.  Curved ergonomic handle.

While thin long brushes are useful in a lot of ways (they've turned out to be really good for cleaning radiators), the reason I got them was for the 'hard bristle' part. They're not all that hard. They feel more like a child's toothbrush, in the way the bristles will bend almost flat with medium pressure. At best, equal to an adult's 'soft' toothbrush. The minimum stiffness I'd expect from a 'hard bristle' description would be equal to a 'medium' toothbrush, but preferably even stiffer. The fact the brushes still have other uses doesn't change that these brushes promise "hard" bristles, and don't deliver.

评论概述: Perfect for hard to clean areas
评论详情: I use these to get between my shower doors and to clean spots of stain on my tile grout. These work perfectly as they aren’t too stiff and they aren’t too soft. They are narrow enough to reach into places other brushes can’t go. These are perfect and they make my job so much easier. I highly recommend them

It's always so tough to clean that tiny area between the back of the faucet and the wall. I'd been using a toothbrush but that wasn't ideal. When I saw these, I thought I'd give them a try and so far, they seem pretty good. They work on hard-to-reach crevices and their bristles are sturdy enough to make a difference.  The only reason I didn't give 5 stars is because the bristles aren't quite up to full grout cleaning, as advertised. Grout *surface* cleaning, sure. But they're a bit too soft for scrubbing grout hard. Mind you, if my grout ever gets so bad that these don't make a dent, I'll have a bigger problem and will need to find a completely different tool.  But I do think these brushes are really good. Solid 4 stars. And a pack of three brushes at this price? Totally worth it.

评论概述: Stiff bristles are great for scrubbing grout lines
评论详情: These brushes aren’t as large as I was expecting from the pictures (which I’m glad for).  They have stiff nylon bristles that are great for scrubbing stubborn stains on narrow shower grout grooves, but soft enough not to cause damage to the surrounding tiles.  The bent tip allows the brush to easily fit into corners, and the handle fits comfortably into my (medium sized female) hand. These would also be great for cleaning door and window tracks.  At $8.99 for three (at the time of this review) they are a great value, and won’t be expensive to replace when they eventually wear out.  I would definitely recommend these.

Our shower is notorious for growing mold and mildew. I got this set to help with the grout (one brush) and to use the other brushes to clean under the rim in our toilets. I have not yet tried the toilet cleaning with these brushes but have used the grout one in the shower. I am very impressed. First I sprayed the area with hydrogen peroxide, left it a minute, then started to scrub with this brush. It really works! Some bristles on the end started to stick out, but they neither fell out nor took diminished the cleaning ability.  Edit: They do not clean under the rim of a toilet very well due to their shape. They still do an amazing job of grout cleaning, though.  This is a good little set of brushes.

评论概述: these work very well for my shower tiles
评论详情: These brushes are very effective for what I needed. I have a tiled shower which is pretty old, and sometimes a little mildew accumulates in the seams, and these brushes reach right into those spots and clean them perfectly.  The materials are solid, yet not overly abrasive. The bristles are plastic or nylon, the handle is hard plastic, and the brush where the bristles are attached is metal. The handle is fairly comfortable to use. There is a slight upward bend to the very end of the brush which allows the bristles to apply even pressure in the seams between tiles even into the corners. That was a great design feature!  Honestly, the brushes are nice enough that one will last me for a long time, so the three pack will last even longer! Might delegate another brush to my other bathroom for any cleaning I need to do there as well.

评论概述: Perfect for baseboards and other hard-to-reach areas
评论详情: These brushes have been a great tool for tackling tough grime in grout lines, bathroom tiles, baseboards, and other small crevices. The bristles are firm and effective at scrubbing without being too harsh on surfaces. I’ve used them in the kitchen, bathroom, and even on window tracks, and they’ve done a great job of getting into tight spaces where other brushes can't reach. The handles are comfortable to hold, and the set is durable. If you're looking for a reliable set of cleaning brushes for detailed work, this is a solid choice.

I was able to clean under the bridge of my guitars, around the fossette in the restroom sink and kitchen sink and am ready to clean anything else I could think of. I like that it came with 3 because I do not want to dirty some of them more than others since I use it for stuff like my guitar.
